Posts.Content: i had a masectomy 20 days ago with reconstruction im sore ache feel unhappy with my body. yet im here i have just had the results ive got to have chemo and radiotheraphy. but im nearly 50 and have so much to live for so the only advice i give is relax take your pain killers. all the best xx
Posts.Title: Mastectomy tomorrow, 9-9-15
